thread.title: Nawazuddin Siddiqui: Consider Shah Rukh and Salman my co-actors, not stars
thread.title_full: Nawazuddin Siddiqui: Consider Shah Rukh and Salman my co-actors, not stars - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Nawazuddin Siddiqui: Consider Shah Rukh and Salman my co-actors, not stars
text:
Nawazuddin Siddiqui, who has A-listers of Bollywood wishing to work with him, says he does not want to think about the prominence of big stars like Shah Rukh Khan and Salman Khan as he considers them as colleagues when he is performing.*Nawazuddin Siddiqui*
Nawazuddin, who worked with Salman in " Bajrangi Bhaijaan " has just ... Â»
